ms-momo

欢迎来到Ms MOMO日式美容院！这里是您体验日本传统美容秘技的绝佳去处。 我们的美容师拥有深厚的日式美容传统知识和精湛的技艺，他们擅长运用日本古老的美容手法，结合现代科技，为您带来一场独特的护理体验。无论是温和的面部按摩，还是精致的身体护理，我们都将以细致入微的手法，帮助您恢复肌肤的平衡与活力。 在Ms MOMO您将体验到日本独特的美容理念——强调内外兼修，注重身心的平衡与和谐。我们的护理项目不仅仅关注外在的美丽，更重视通过护理手法的温柔触摸，为您带来身心放松与舒缓。 除了传统的护理手法，我们的护理项目融合了日本经典的美容手法和现代科技，致力于带给您最佳的美肌效果。从传统的面部按摩到日本特色的面膜护理，我们精心挑选了最优质的产品和技术，以确保您的肌肤得到最细致的呵护。 无论您是追求日式清新的美肌，还是渴望在繁忙生活中寻找片刻的静谧，我们都将竭诚为您打造一场美与心灵的奇妙之旅。 期待您的光临，与我们一同领略日式美容的独特魅力！

如果您有美容护肤以及瘦身需求，请通过WhatsApp直接联系我们的美容顾问

We've got what you need!

Welcome to Ms MOMO Japanese Beauty & Wellness Salon! Here is the perfect place for you to experience the traditional beauty secrets of Japan. Our beauticians possess profound knowledge of Japanese beauty traditions and exceptional skills. They excel in employing ancient Japanese beauty techniques combined with modern technology to offer you a unique pampering experience. Whether it's a gentle facial massage or an exquisite body treatment, we will use meticulous techniques to help restore the balance and vitality of your skin. In our beauty salon, you will immerse yourself in Japan's unique beauty philosophy, which emphasizes the harmony of inner and outer beauty and the balance of body and mind. Our beauty treatments not only focus on external beauty but also prioritize providing relaxation and soothing touch through our techniques. In addition to traditional beauty techniques, our treatments integrate both ancient Japanese beauty traditions and modern technology, aiming to deliver the best skincare results for you. From traditional facial massages to Japanese-inspired mask treatments, we carefully select the finest products and techniques to ensure your skin receives the most delicate care. Whether you're seeking Japanese-inspired radiant skin or a moment of tranquillity amidst your busy life, we are committed to crafting a magical journey of beauty and inner peace for you. We look forward to welcoming you and experiencing the unique charm of Japanese beauty together!

和Slim beauty 的合作

Ms MOMO日式美容院与Slim beauty合作，为您提供更多美容护理选择。Slim beauty是新加坡领先的美容护理品牌，拥有丰富的美容护理经验和专业的美容团队。我们的合作项目包括瘦身护理、美容护肤、面部护理等，旨在为您提供全方位的美容护理服务。 Slim beauty的美容师拥有丰富的美容护理经验和专业的技术，他们擅长运用最新的美容技术和产品，为您带来最佳的美容效果。无论您是追求瘦身效果，还是渴望拥有美丽的肌肤，我们都将为您提供最专业的美容护理服务。 通过Ms MOMO日式美容院与Slim beauty的合作，我们将为您打造一场美容护理之旅，帮助您实现美丽与健康的完美平衡。无论您是追求瘦身效果，还是渴望拥有美丽的肌肤，我们都将为您提供最专业的美容护理服务。 期待您的光临，与我们一同领略日式美容的独特魅力！
如果您有美容护肤以及瘦身需求，请通过WhatsApp直接联系我们的美容顾问

和POLA的合作

Ms MOMO日式美容院与POLA合作，为您提供更多美容护理选择。POLA是日本著名的美容护理品牌，拥有悠久的美容护理历史和丰富的美容护理经验。我们的合作项目包括面部护理、美容护肤、身体护理等，旨在为您提供最优质的美容护理服务。 POLA的美容师拥有深厚的美容护理知识和专业的技术，他们擅长运用最优质的美容产品和技术，为您带来最佳的美容效果。无论您是追求美丽的肌肤，还是渴望拥有健康的身体，我们都将为您提供最专业的美容护理服务。 通过Ms MOMO日式美容院与POLA的合作，我们将为您打造一场美容护理之旅，帮助您实现美丽与健康的完美平衡。无论您是追求美丽的肌肤，还是渴望拥有健康的身体，我们都将为您提供最专业的美容护理服务。 期待您的光临，与我们一同领略日式美容的独特魅力！
如果您有美容护肤以及瘦身需求，请通过WhatsApp直接联系我们的美容顾问

POLA THE BEAUTY

POLA 黑BA系列护理
POLA B.A Signature TREATMENTS
高端贵妇院线护肤品牌POLA的专注专业抗糖13年，专注抗糖和提升紧致，改善肌肤暗沉，专业肌肤护理和提供全面肌肤解决方案
The high-end luxury skincare brand POLA focuses on professional anti-glycation for 13 years, specializing in anti-glycation and firming, improving skin dullness, professional skincare, and providing comprehensive solutions for skin care.

WhatsApp


POLA黑BA小颜温感石膏护理 POLA B.A Anti-aging & Lifting Treatment

项目亮点：抗皮肤糖化，排出多高糖化的角质和垃圾；改善没有弹性，暗沉，干燥，起皮的肌肤，属于高级抗衰贵妇护理。
温感的护理可以帮助排出面部肌肤里的废物和毒素，让石膏面膜里面的美容成分深层吸收；做一次等同于一次帮肌肤灌入十倍的抗糖精华，修复松弛下垂角质层和真皮层的受损肌肤。 Key Highlights: This mask is formulated to combat skin glycation by eliminating highly glycated keratin and waste. It targets skin concerns such as lack of elasticity, dullness, dryness, and flakiness, making it an advanced anti-aging treatment for sophisticated women. The warming action of this treatment aids in expelling waste and toxins from facial skin, allowing the beauty ingredients within the plaster mask to deeply penetrate. A single session is equivalent to infusing the skin with ten times the anti-glycation essence, repairing damaged skin in both the keratin and dermal layers, addressing laxity and sagging.

主要成分：黑BA的核心抗糖化成分YAC精华、EG净化精华，连续使用可以祛除角质层和真皮层中大部分的高糖生化物；修复受损角质层、促进细胞再生的黄金蚕丝成分；48种植物精华。POLA实验室证明，坚持3个月后皮肤暗沉、松弛显著改善。

Key Ingredients: The core anti-glycation components of Black BA include YAC Essence and EG Purifying Essence, which, when used consistently, effectively eliminate most high-glycation substances in the keratin and dermal layers. The formula also contains golden silk components, which repair damaged keratin layers and promote cellular regeneration. Additionally, there are 48 plant extracts incorporated into the formula. POLA Laboratories have confirmed that after three months of consistent use, significant improvements are observed in skin dullness and laxity.

POLA黑BA美白温感护理 POLA B.A Whitening & Anti-aging Treatment

项目亮点：美白抗糖化，针对改善肌肤透明感，也可改善肌肤的晒斑，雀斑，暗沉，干燥，起皮问题。

Project Highlights: Whitening and anti-glycation, targeting the improvement of skin transparency, as well as addressing issues such as sunspots, freckles, dullness, dryness, and flakiness.
主要成分：黑BA的核心抗糖化成分YAC精华、EG净化精华，并配合苦参、蜂花、海藻等保湿美白成分，还能去除肌肤炎症，直达肌肤内部。POLA实验室证明，3个月后皮肤色斑显著淡化，肤色更亮。
Key Ingredients: The core anti-glycation components of Black BA include YAC Essence and EG Purifying Essence, combined with moisturizing and whitening ingredients such as sophora, honey flower, and seaweed extract. These ingredients not only improve skin hydration and brightness but also alleviate skin inflammation, penetrating deeply into the skin. POLA Laboratories have confirmed that after three months of consistent use, skin blemishes significantly lighten, and the complexion becomes brighter.

POLA黑BA小颜温感石膏护理 POLA B.A Anti-aging & Lifting Treatment

项目亮点：抗皮肤糖化，排出多高糖化的角质和垃圾；改善没有弹性，暗沉，干燥，起皮的肌肤，属于高级抗衰贵妇护理。
温感的护理可以帮助排出面部肌肤里的废物和毒素，让石膏面膜里面的美容成分深层吸收；做一次等同于一次帮肌肤灌入十倍的抗糖精华，修复松弛下垂角质层和真皮层的受损肌肤。 Key Highlights: This mask is formulated to combat skin glycation by eliminating highly glycated keratin and waste. It targets skin concerns such as lack of elasticity, dullness, dryness, and flakiness, making it an advanced anti-aging treatment for sophisticated women. The warming action of this treatment aids in expelling waste and toxins from facial skin, allowing the beauty ingredients within the plaster mask to deeply penetrate. A single session is equivalent to infusing the skin with ten times the anti-glycation essence, repairing damaged skin in both the keratin and dermal layers, addressing laxity and sagging.

主要成分：黑BA的核心抗糖化成分YAC精华、EG净化精华，连续使用可以祛除角质层和真皮层中大部分的高糖生化物；修复受损角质层、促进细胞再生的黄金蚕丝成分；48种植物精华。POLA实验室证明，坚持3个月后皮肤暗沉、松弛显著改善。

Key Ingredients: The core anti-glycation components of Black BA include YAC Essence and EG Purifying Essence, which, when used consistently, effectively eliminate most high-glycation substances in the keratin and dermal layers. The formula also contains golden silk components, which repair damaged keratin layers and promote cellular regeneration. Additionally, there are 48 plant extracts incorporated into the formula. POLA Laboratories have confirmed that after three months of consistent use, significant improvements are observed in skin dullness and laxity.

POLA APEX （又称“私人定制”系列）APEX SKIN TREATMENTS (PERSONAL CARE PROGRAMS)

APEX系列的基本特点：通过不同肌肤问题进行定制化方案推荐，帮助问题肌肤提升肤质免疫能力，坚持3次后可以看到明显的肌肤问题改善。
The basic characteristics of the APEX series are: customized solutions recommended for different skin problems, helping problematic skin improve its immune capacity, and noticeable improvements in skin problems can be seen after three sessions.
1. POLA APEX 敏感肌修复护理POLA APEX Sensitive Skin Repair treatment
主要亮点：推荐敏感、角质层薄弱、沙漠肌，皮肤锁水力差的肌肤使用。能有效呵护和修护调理角质层，预防皮肤粗糙和干燥，调理皮肤的新陈代谢，强化角质层的预防功能，抗炎。
Key Features: Recommended for sensitive, thin stratum corneum, desert skin, and skin with poor moisture retention. Effectively nurtures and repairs the stratum corneum, prevents skin roughness and dryness, regulates skin metabolism, strengthens the preventive function of the stratum corneum, and has anti-inflammatory properties. 主要成分：采用与肌肤融合感超高的上等精油，以及预防皮肤粗糙和干燥的天然植物-紫草、苦参等高保湿型精华。 Main Ingredients: Utilizes premium essential oils with a high affinity for the skin, as well as high-moisture essence from natural plants such as lithospermum and sophora flavescens, which prevent skin roughness and dryness. 2. POLA APEX 净白透明护理 POLA APEX Brightening and Transparent treatment 主要亮点：推荐给肤色不均，暗黄暗沉、晒斑雀斑、干燥粗糙缺乏透明感的皮肤使用。此款面膜是比较果冻质感含有海藻成分的啫喱状美白面膜。 Key Features: Recommended for uneven skin tone, dullness, sunspots, freckles, dryness, roughness, and lack of transparency. This mask has a jelly-like texture containing seaweed components, which provide a whitening effect. 主要成分：POLA实验室独家研发的美白有效成分“噜忻喏®”和“维生素C衍生物”中，加入美容成分马郁兰精华、高浓度苦参精华、姜精华的POLA研发复合成分，增加皮肤透明感和击退黑色素细胞。 Main Ingredients: Exclusive whitening effective ingredients developed by POLA Laboratory, "Luminovoron®" and "Vitamin C derivative", combined with beauty ingredients such as marjoram essence, high-concentration sophora flavescens essence, and ginger essence, developed by POLA to increase skin transparency and combat melanocytes. 3. POLA APEX 油性肌肤祛痘护理POLA APEX Oil-Control & Acne Removing Treatment 主要亮点：消炎镇定肌肤，改善油性肌肤肤质，祛痘和修复受损肌肤，坚持3个月，可看到明显效果。 Key Features: Soothes inflammation, improves oily skin texture, removes acne, and repairs damaged skin. Visible results can be observed after three months of consistent use. 主要成分：含有光滑亮泽紧致肌肤的药用精华液，IPMP-杀菌、蓝莓精华-防止痘痘恶化、菩提树精华-改善角质层肥厚、葵二酸诱导体-防止皮脂堵塞毛孔、GK2-抗炎、VC诱导体-改善基底。 Main Ingredients: Contains medicinal essence that smoothens, brightens, and tightens the skin. Key ingredients include IPMP for antibacterial properties, blueberry extract to prevent acne deterioration, bodhi tree extract to improve thickened stratum corneum, azelaic acid inducer to prevent sebum clogging pores, GK2 for anti-inflammatory effects, and VC inducer to improve basal layer.
